actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to make multipurpose senior centers available to handicapped or disabled individuals who have not attained sixty years of age.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Older Americans Act Amendments of 1978 to make multipurpose senior centers available to handicapped or disabled individuals who have not attained 60 years of age (as well as to senior citizens).

titles.title: A bill to make multipurpose senior centers available to handicapped or disabled individuals who have not attained sixty years of age.
